title: Logitech Bluetooth Easy-Switch Keyboard (K811) review
description:
Logitech's K811 Bluetooth Easy-Switch keyboard is a great replacement keyboard for most any Apple device, but I especially enjoy using it as a controller for my Apple TV, replacing the stock remote control Apple provides.

Find it here: http://www.staples.com/Logitech-Bluetooth-Easy-Switch-Keyboard-for-Mac-iPad-iPhone/product_101769

asset.author: Larry Smoak
